headline: Expand Energy (EXE) Is Up 6.6% After Embracing Fully Electric Fracking In Appalachia – Has The Bull Case Changed?
summary: In February 2026, Expand Energy Corporation and Evolution Well Services announced an agreement to deploy Evolution’s 100% electric hydraulic fracturing technology in Expand’s upcoming completions program in Northeast Appalachia, aiming to reduce site noise, shrink equipment footprint, and improve safety and environmental monitoring through real-time digital metrics. This move highlights how lower-emission, digitally monitored completions could reshape operational efficiency and risk...
